flawed_nl_solution:
3000 new bees are born every day. In 7 days there will be 3000*7=<<3000*7=20100>>20100 new bees
If each day the queen loses 900 bees, in 7 days there will be 900*7=<<900*7=6300>>6300 fewer bees
If at the beginning the queen had 12500 bees, then at the end of 7 days she will have 12500+20100-6300=<<12500+20100-6300=26300>>26300 bees
The total number of bees in the hive including the queen is 26300+1 =<<26300+1=26301>>26301
#### 26301

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21000, not 20100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
